metadata.name: Meeting in the Garden
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: A romantic solitaire where the King and Queen of Hearts navigate a garden maze to find each other.

cards.note: King and Queen of Hearts are the protagonists

instructions.overview: Help the King of Hearts navigate through a garden maze to meet the Queen of Hearts. Remove matching cards to clear the path and bring the royal couple together.
setup: Choose your garden size (5×5 or 6×6 grid)
The King of Hearts is placed in the top-left corner
The Queen of Hearts is placed in the bottom-right corner
All other spaces are filled with cards from the shuffled deck
The remaining cards form a stock pile for refilling
gameplay: Remove pairs of cards that match by SUIT or RANK
Matching cards must be adjacent (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) OR separated by exactly one card
When you remove cards, empty spaces are immediately filled from the stock pile
Once the stock is empty, the grid compresses: all cards (including King and Queen) slide toward the top-left to fill gaps
This compression physically moves the King and Queen closer together
Mobile Controls: Pinch with two fingers to zoom. Drag with two fingers to pan the board.
Optional Suitor Rule: Other Kings and Queens can 'block' the meeting if they end up adjacent to your protagonists
instructions.winning: Remove all cards from the garden until only the King and Queen of Hearts remain, positioned adjacent to each other.
